column4: hey, i installed php5 and apache2, but apache isn't recognising php files
do i have to add something to the default site conf?
you need to setup apache to handle .php files with the php interpreter - in the site that you want php enabled (not necessarily the default site)
sudo a2enmod php5 # after making sure php5 is installed -- that should get you started -- have a look at the php documentation for apache for further configuration
